alert.note: Alert for Cooper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued August 02 at 9:18PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Hydrologic Outlook for the following rivers... Petite Saline Creek near Boonville This hydrologic outlook is based on the forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours and estimated runoff from earlier rainfall. Crests may vary if actual rainfall or runoff is greater or less than anticipated. Location: Petite Saline Creek near Boonville Flood stage: 16.0 feet Latest stage: 5.4 feet at 8 PM Wednesday Maximum Forecast Stage: 18.5 feet at 1 AM Friday Aug 04 Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat 1am 1am 1am Petite Saline Creek Boonville 16.0 5.4 Wed 8pm 4.9 18.5 4.4 Later statements, possibly warnings, may be issued as additional information becomes available.
